title: Loops_ACID_8pks_xeno.rar
description:
8pack projects illustrate how a song is constructed in ACID software, and how  

easy it is to combine loops from various Sony Sound Series Loops and Samples  

libraries. Each 8pk contains 8 to 10 or more acidized loops which can be download  

for free off the ACID site.


I downloaded these loops over the past year or two off of "acidplanet.com". They 

consist of various generes of music. The loops can be used in any ACID software 

such as Acid Pro, Acid Music Studio and any other loop based music creation 

software. All the loops are in .wav file format. Most are 16bit 44khz. There are a 

few that are 24bit.There are about 65 8pks and approx 600 loops=1gb.


More 8pks here: http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/4811079/More_Acid_8_Packs.rar


I also have the 3000 loops that came with Acid Music Studio. You can find them 

here: http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/4496119/3000_Acid_Loops_1000_Midi



Please take a moment to leave comment.


Thanks to those of you who show your support by seeding this torrent.


Left click on my name to find my other loop torrents.


1. Unrar

2. Have fun! 


Xeno
